page.title: 14Recreation and Leisure
page.content: Gardening is the leading recreational activity. Horse-riding is popular, and some paddocks are set out with jumps & dressage equipment. The Crawley and Horsham Hunt is well supported and is on good terms with most farmers. The nearest leisure centre and swimming pool is in Horsham, but several homes have their own swimming pools. The nearest place of entertainment is the Arts Centre at Christ's Hospital, to which there is no public transport. The new Arts Centre in Horsham is not much better served, as the single bus service is infrequent and there are no concessionary bus fares. The area lies between the A.24 and A.29 routes to the coast, so tourism is of the 'passing through' variety. A few homes offer Bed and Breakfast. The number of ramblers and cyclists is increasing, especially from Holland.
